title: Options to Finance Medicare for All
driving_question: How can the United States finance a Medicare for All single-payer health care system?
tasks: Analyze the current health care spending in the United States
Identify the benefits and drawbacks of a Medicare for All system
Explore various options to finance a Medicare for All system
Compare the U.S. health care system to other major industrialized nations
Propose your own solution for financing Medicare for All
pre_thinking_prompts: What do you know about the current health care system in the U.S.?
What are some potential benefits of a Medicare for All system?
What challenges might arise in financing a Medicare for All system?
reflection_prompt: Reflect on the various options discussed for financing Medicare for All. Which do you think is the most feasible and why?
ai_tutor_prompts: What is the current health care spending in the U.S.?
What are the administrative costs of the traditional Medicare program?
What are some potential ways to save costs in a Medicare for All system?
What are some potential sources of revenue to finance Medicare for All?

ideas: Create a presentation outlining your proposed solution for financing Medicare for All
Write a letter to a local representative advocating for your chosen financing option
Design a poster illustrating the benefits of a Medicare for All system
